snippet: The woman, Pamela Kaner, 59, was taking care of the girl for the afternoon; the two were in water when something went wrong, the police in Putnam County, N.Y., said.
abstract: Six-year-old girl, whose name is being withheld by police, is found clinging to the floating corpse of family friend Pamela Kaner, 59, in Lake Gleneida, a small reservoir in Carmel, NY; cause of Kaner's death is unknown and an autopsy has been scheduled.
lead_paragraph: The woman, Pamela Kaner, 59, was taking care of the girl for the afternoon; the two were in water when something went wrong, the police in Putnam County, N.Y., said.

headline.seo: Girl Found in Putnam County Lake Clinging to Woman’s Body
headline.main: Girl, 6, Is Found Clinging to Woman’s Body in a Lake
headline.print_headline: Girl, 6, Is Found Clinging to Woman’s Body in a Lake
